article.title: Autometric Receives $8 Million National Geospatial & Intelligence Agency Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Autometric Incorporated, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Boeing Space and Intelligence Systems Division, Springfield, Virginia, was recently awarded an $8 million contract for data production of high-resolution terrain elevation for bare earth and reflective surfaces. National Geospatial & Intelligence Agency, St. Louis, Missouri, is the contracting activity.
